content.html: Why do I mention people being “white” when talk I about them? Sometimes, it’s pertinent to the story, especially when they involve power dynamics. Mostly, I do it bc if I don’t, most people assume white. As a result, the race of POCs is often said. I refuse to be ok with that.

Why do I mention people being “white” when talk I about them?

Sometimes, it’s pertinent to the story, especially when they involve power dynamics. 

Mostly, I do it bc if I don’t, most people assume white. As a result, the race of POCs is often said. I refuse to be ok with that.
